column6: Sci-Fi legend Orson Scott Card (Ender's Game, Speaker for the Dead) and comic book royalty Andy Kubert (1602, Wolverine:Origin) bring you the second part of the secret origin of Tony Stark, Ultimate Iron Man!  A child of science and nature, Tony Stark is not like "normal" kids-he's much more.  See the construction of the man and his armor!
column8: | writer:Orson Scott Card | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | colorist:Richard Isanove | penciller (cover):Andy Kubert | inker:Danny K. Miki
